channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report E-2024080085
item.description:
Report E-2024080085

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-08T15:13:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-02
  • City: BUTTE
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ERTS was contacted by XPO Logistics (UBU) about a cargo release. The terminal requested a contractor out to clean and contain the release. Hanser's Environmental was dispatched to the site. Upon the contractorâ€™s arrival, personnel observed that the released material impacted a 1ft-by-1ft area of the top of the tote and estimated that two (2) quarts of material were released due to the cap being loose. Hanser's Environmental personnel tightened the cap, and no tote transfer was necessary. No waste was generated.

item.title: Report X-2024080160
item.description:

  • Description: 1 gallon of paint inside fibreboard outer package along with added roofing supplies leaked. cleaned locally and secured in salvage drum.
